fields.summary: Upgrade Java SDK V2 to v2.31.66+
fields.description:
Upgrade Java SDK to v2.31.66 or higher. 

Follow the qualification process defined in [https://github.com/steveloughran/engineering-proposals/blob/trunk/qualifying-an-SDK-upgrade.md] .

 

2.31.66+ should now support third party stores, this was previously a blocker to upgrade SDK. 

Upgrade is needed as it has support for some S3 express features, and a fix for https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-java-v2/issues/5247

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open
